blend-tweens.title: Blend Tweens
blend-tweens.description: Blend between two tweens using a bezier interpolator.

chain.title: Chain
chain.description: Chain a linear sequence of actions.

color-tween.title: Color Tween
color-tween.description: Blends from one color to another using linear interpolation.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: A dummy action that completes after a set duration of time.

parallel.title: Parallel
parallel.description: Control playback of multiple actions in parallel.

physics.title: Physics
physics.description: Simulate velocity, acceleration, friction and spring physics.

stagger.title: Stagger
stagger.description: Stagger the start of a series of a actions.

tween.title: Tween
tween.description: Change a value over a specific duration of time.

value.title: Value
value.description: A simple value that updates when a new number is passed to `set`.

calc.title: Calculators
calc.description: Simple functions useful in UI calculations.

easing.title: Easing
easing.description: Functions that speed or slow a tween over time.

render-loop.title: Render Loop
render-loop.description: Schedule functions to run on Popmotion's internal render loop.

transformers.title: Transformers
transformers.description: Simple composable functions that take a value and return a new one.

functional-value-pipelines.title: Create a momentum and spring-based slider with composed value pipelines
functional-value-pipelines.description: This guide explains how we can build complex interaction behaviors out of very simple functional blocks.
